author: Reuters Editorial
title: Zargon Oil & Gas Q1 Funds Flow Used In Operating Activities Per Basic Share $0.01
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Zargon Oil & Gas Ltd:
* ZARGON OIL & GAS LTD. PROVIDES 2018 FIRST QUARTER RESULTS AND PROVIDES SECOND HALF 2018 GUIDANCE
* ZARGON OIL & GAS LTD - QTRLY FUNDS FLOW USED IN OPERATING ACTIVITIES PER BASIC SHARE $0.01
* ZARGON OIL & GAS - Q1 PRODUCTION AVERAGED 2,427 BARRELS OF OIL EQUIVALENT/DAY, DOWN 6 PERCENT FROM Q1 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
